attributes.action: Close boarders after London's attack. It is time to act now. Do what's right.
attributes.additional_details: It would be only a matter of time before others copy this. We definitely must protect our country and closing the boarders is a fast acting way!
attributes.background: After the attack in London 22/03/2017 we must take action now and act fast. People should not be suffering. Close boarders fast. We need to act fast and act now. Innocent lives are been taken because it is easy to get in the UK and do these awful attacks.
